message: Starting registry analysis - examining current structure in real_mcp_server.py
Examined registry structure - now mapping all functions that read registry fields
Examining actual registry JSON files to understand data patterns and analyze full registry schema
Mapping how orchestration_prompt is generated - examining deploy_headless_agent full flow for prompt assembly
Analyzing performance impact - checking registry read patterns and frequency to assess new field overhead
Creating comprehensive migration strategy with versioning approach and rollback plan

Registry analysis complete. Delivered comprehensive migration strategy with zero-downtime approach. Documented: (1) Current registry structure across 18 fields, (2) Complete usage map across 7 functions, (3) task_description usage at 4 critical points, (4) Agent prompt assembly flow with injection point identified, (5) 4-phase migration plan requiring NO version field, (6) Backward compatibility guaranteed for all 24 call sites, (7) Performance impact assessed as negligible, (8) 5-minute rollback plan. Evidence: output/REGISTRY_ANALYSIS_COMPLETE.md (70KB, 500+ lines). Ready for builder implementation.
